00006 #include "Point.h"
00007 #include "Promotion.h"
00008 #include "libSerialize.h"
00009 template <class PRECISION>
00010 class PointOf<3,PRECISION>
00011 {
00012 public:
00013         PRECISION m_xX;
00014         PRECISION m_xY;
00015         PRECISION m_xZ;
00016 
00017         typedef PRECISION type_precision;
00018         static const int DIMENSIONALITY = 3;
00019         static const int type_dimensionality = 3;
00020 
00021 public:
00022 
00023         PointOf(PRECISION* vx){
00024                 m_xX=vx[0];
00025                 m_xY=vx[1];
00026                 m_xZ=vx[2];
00027         }
00028 
00029         template <class PRECISION2>
00030         PointOf(const PRECISION2& x){
00031                 m_xX=x;
00032                 m_xY=x;
00033                 m_xZ=x;
00034         }
00035 
00036         PointOf()
00037         {
00038         }
00039 
00040         String Describe() const;
00041 
00042         template <class OTHERPRECISION>
00043         PointOf(const PointOf<3,OTHERPRECISION> &pt){
00044                 m_xX=pt.m_xX;
00045                 m_xY=pt.m_xY;
00046                 m_xZ=pt.m_xZ;
00047         }
00048 
00049         const PRECISION& Dim(int n) const{
00050                 return (n==0)?m_xX:((n==1)?m_xY:m_xZ);
00051         }
00052         PRECISION& Dim(int n) {
00053                 return (n==0)?m_xX:((n==1)?m_xY:m_xZ);
00054         }
00055 
00056         PRECISION CVolume() const{
00057                 return m_xX*m_xY*m_xZ;
00058         }
00059 
00060         PointOf<3,PRECISION>& AdvanceLoop(
00061                 const PointOf<3,PRECISION>& ptBy = 1
00062         ){
00063                 m_xX+=ptBy.m_xX;
00064                 return *this;
00065         }
00066 
00067         bool StillLooping(
00068                 const PointOf<3,PRECISION>& ptTo,
00069                 const PointOf<3,PRECISION>& ptFrom=0,
00070                 const PointOf<3,PRECISION>& ptBy=1
00071         ){
00072                 if (m_xX<ptTo.X()){
00073                         return true;
00074                 }
00075 
00076                 if (m_xY+ptBy.m_xY<ptTo.Y()){
00077                         m_xX=ptFrom.m_xX;
00078                         m_xY+=ptBy.m_xY;
00079                         return true;
00080                 }
00081 
00082                 if (m_xZ+ptBy.m_xZ<ptTo.Z()){
00083                         m_xX=ptFrom.m_xX;
00084                         m_xY=ptFrom.m_xY;
00085                         m_xZ+=ptBy.m_xZ;
00086                         return true;
00087                 }
00088 
00089                 return false;
00090         }
00091 
00092 
00093         PointOf(PRECISION xX, PRECISION xY, PRECISION xZ){
00094                 m_xX=xX;
00095                 m_xY=xY;
00096                 m_xZ=xZ;
00097         }
00098 
00099         const PRECISION& X() const {return m_xX;}
00100         const PRECISION& Y() const {return m_xY;}
00101         const PRECISION& Z() const {return m_xZ;}
00102 
00103         PRECISION& X() {return m_xX;}
00104         PRECISION& Y() {return m_xY;}
00105         PRECISION& Z() {return m_xZ;}
00106 
00107         PointOf<3,PRECISION> Bound(
00108                 const PointOf<3,PRECISION> &ptMin,
00109                 const PointOf<3,PRECISION> &ptMax
00110         ) const {
00111                 return PointOf<3,PRECISION>(
00112 			::Bound(X(),ptMin.X(),ptMax.X()),
00113                         ::Bound(Y(),ptMin.Y(),ptMax.Y()),
00114                         ::Bound(Z(),ptMin.Z(),ptMax.Z())
00115                 );
00116         }
00117 
00118         operator PointOf<3,Real>() const;
00119 
00120         static String SerializationId()
00121         {
00122                 return "Point3D";
00123         }
00124 
00125         void Serialize(Stream &st) const
00126         { 
00127 		::Serialize(st,m_xX);
00128 		::Serialize(st,m_xY);
00129 		::Serialize(st,m_xZ);
00130         }
00131 
00132         void Deserialize(Stream& st)
00133         {
00134 		::Deserialize(st,m_xX);
00135 		::Deserialize(st,m_xY);
00136 		::Deserialize(st,m_xZ);
00137         }
00138 };

00144 typedef PointOf<3,int> Point3D;
00145 typedef PointOf<3,Real> Point3DReal;

00152 inline Point3DReal::operator Point3DReal() const
00153 {
00154         return *this;
00155 }
00156 
00157 
00158 template<>
00159 inline Point3D::operator Point3DReal() const
00160 {
00161         return Point3DReal(Real(m_xX), Real(m_xY),Real(m_xZ));
00162 }

00166 //============================================================================
00167 // Describe() implementations
00168 //============================================================================
00169 template<class PRECISION>
00170 inline String PointOf<3,PRECISION>::Describe() const
00171 {
00172         return String("(") +  m_xX + ", " +  m_xY + ", " + m_xZ + ")" ;
00173 }

00176 //============================================================================
00177 //============================================================================
00178 template<class PRECISION>
00179 inline PointOf<3,PRECISION> NewRandomPoint(
00180         const PointOf<3,PRECISION> &pt
00181 )
00182 {
00183         return PointOf<3,PRECISION> (
00184                 Random(PRECISION(0),pt.X()),
00185                 Random(PRECISION(0),pt.Y()),
00186                 Random(PRECISION(0),pt.Z())
00187         );
00188 }

00192 //============================================================================
00193 // create (point x point) operators
00194 // where x is {+,-,*,/}
00195 //============================================================================
00196 #define POINT3D_OPERATOR(_op)                                                                                                                                                                           \
00197         template <class T1, class T2>                                                                                                                                                                   \
00198         inline typename PromotionOf<PointOf<3,T1>,PointOf<3,T2> >::type operator _op ( \
00199                 const PointOf<3,T1>& pt1, const PointOf<3,T2>& pt2                                                                      \
00200         )                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       \
00201         {                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       \
00202                 return typename PromotionOf<PointOf<3,T1>,PointOf<3,T2> >::type(                        \
00203                         pt1.X() _op pt2.X(),pt1.Y() _op pt2.Y(), pt1.Z() _op pt2.Z()                    \
00204                 );                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      \
00205         }                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       \

00212 //============================================================================
00213 // create (point x point) operators
00214 // where x is {+=,-=,*=,/=}
00215 //============================================================================
00216 #define POINT3D_SELFOPERATOR(_op)                                                                                                                                                               \
00217         template <class T1, class T2>                                                                                                                                                                   \
00218         inline PointOf<3,T1> operator _op (                                                                                                                                             \
00219                 PointOf<3,T1>& pt1, const PointOf<3,T2>& pt2                                                                                            \
00220         )                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       \
00221         {                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       \
00222                 pt1.X() _op pt2.X();                                                                                                                                                                                            \
00223                 pt1.Y() _op pt2.Y();                                                                                                                                                                                            \
00224                 pt1.Z() _op pt2.Z();                                                                                                                                                                                            \
00225                 return pt1;                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     \
00226         }

00233 //============================================================================
00234 // create (point x scalar) operators
00235 // where x is {+=,-=,*=,/=}
00236 //============================================================================
00237 #define POINT3D_SELFSCALAROPERATOR(_op)                                                                                                                                 \
00238         template <class T1, class T2>                                                                                                                                                                   \
00239         inline PointOf<3,T1> operator _op (                                                                                                                                             \
00240                 PointOf<3,T1>& pt1, const T2& t2                                                                                                                                                \
00241         )                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       \
00242         {                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       \
00243                 pt1.X() _op t2;                                                                                                                                                                                                                 \
00244                 pt1.Y() _op t2;                                                                                                                                                                                                                 \
00245                 pt1.Z() _op t2;                                                                                                                                                                                                                 \
00246                 return pt1;                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     \
00247         }

00259 #define POINT3D_SCALAROPERATOR(_op)                                                                                                                                     \
00260         template <class T1, class T2>                                                                                                                                                   \
00261         inline typename PromotionOf<PointOf<3,T1>,T2 >::type operator _op (     \
00262                 const PointOf<3,T1>& pt1, const T2& t2                                                                                                  \
00263         )                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       \
00264         {                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       \

00266                         pt1.X() _op t2,pt1.Y() _op t2, pt1.Z() _op t2                                                                   \
00267                 );                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      \

00271                 const T1& t1, const PointOf<3,T2>& pt2                                                                                                  \

00273         {                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       \

00275                         t1 _op pt2.X(),t1 _op pt2.Y(), t1 _op pt2.Z()                                                                   \
00276                 );                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      \
00277         }

00285 //============================================================================
00286 // create (point x point) operators
00287 // where x is {<,<=,>,>=,==,!=}
00288 //============================================================================
00289 #define POINT3D_COMPARATOR(_op,_opCombine)                                                      \
00290         template <class T1, class T2>                                                                                                   \
00291         inline bool operator _op (                                                                                                              \
00292                 const PointOf<3,T1>& pt1, const PointOf<3,T2>& pt2      \
00293         )                                                                                                                                                                                                                       \
00294         {                                                                                                                                                                                                                       \
00295                 return (                                                                                                                                                                                \
00296                         pt1.X() _op pt2.X()                                                                                                                             \
00297                         _opCombine pt1.Y() _op pt2.Y()                                                                          \
00298                         _opCombine pt1.Z() _op pt2.Z()                                                                          \
00299                 );                                                                                                                                                                                                      \
00300         }
00301 
00302 POINT3D_COMPARATOR(<,||);
00303 POINT3D_COMPARATOR(<=,||);
00304 POINT3D_COMPARATOR(>,||);
00305 POINT3D_COMPARATOR(>=,||);
00306 POINT3D_COMPARATOR(!=,||);
00307 POINT3D_COMPARATOR(==,&&);

00309 //============================================================================
00310 // create (point x point) operators
00311 // where x is {<,<=,>,>=,==,!=}
00312 //============================================================================
00313 #define POINT3D_SCALARCOMPARATOR(_op,_opCombine)        \
00314         template <class T1, class T2>                                                                           \
00315         inline bool operator _op (                                                                                      \
00316                 const PointOf<3,T1>& pt1,const T2& t2                                   \
00317         )                                                                                                                                                                                               \
00318         {                                                                                                                                                                                               \
00319                 return (                                                                                                                                                        \
00320                         pt1.X() _op t2                                                                                                                  \
00321                         _opCombine pt1.Y() _op t2                                                                               \
00322                         _opCombine pt1.Z() _op t2                                                                               \
00323                 );                                                                                                                                                                              \
00324         }                                                                                                                                                                                               \
00325         template <class T1, class T2>                                                                           \
00326         inline bool operator _op (                                                                                      \
00327                 const T1& t1, const PointOf<3,T2>& pt2                          \
00328         )                                                                                                                                                                                               \
00329         {                                                                                                                                                                                               \
00330                 return (                                                                                                                                                        \
00331                         t1 _op pt2.X()                                                                                                                  \
00332                         _opCombine t1 _op pt2.Y()                                                                               \
00333                         _opCombine t1 _op pt2.Z()                                                                               \
00334                 );                                                                                                                                                                              \
00335         }

00358         )                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               \
00359         {                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               \
00360                 return typename PromotionOf<PointOf<3,T1>,PointOf<3,T2> >::type(                                                \
00361                         _fxn(pt1.X(), pt2.X())                                                                                                                                                                                                  \
00362                         , _fxn(pt1.Y(), pt2.Y())                                                                                                                                                                                                \
00363                         , _fxn(pt1.Z(), pt2.Z())                                                                                                                                                                                                \
00364                 );                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              \

00371 //============================================================================
00372 // create (point x scalar) and (scalar x point) operators
00373 // where x is {+,-,*,/}
00374 //============================================================================
00375 #define POINT3D_SCALARFUNCTION(_fxn)                                                                                                                            \
00376         template <class T1, class T2>                                                                                                                                                   \
00377         inline typename PromotionOf<PointOf<3,T1>,T2 >::type                                                            \
00378         _fxn (                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          \
00379                 const PointOf<3,T1>& pt1, const T2& t2                                                                                                  \
00380         )                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       \
00381         {                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       \
00382                 return typename PromotionOf<PointOf<3,T1>,T2 >::type(                                                   \
00383                         _fxn(pt1.X(), t2)                                                                                                                                                                                       \
00384                         , _fxn(pt1.Y(), t2)                                                                                                                                                                             \
00385                         , _fxn(pt1.Z(), t2)                                                                                                                                                                             \
00386                 );                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      \
00387         }                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       \
00388         template <class T1, class T2>                                                                                                                                                   \
00389         inline typename PromotionOf<T1,PointOf<3,T2> >::type                                                            \
00390         _fxn (                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          \
00391                 const T1& t1, const PointOf<3,T2>& pt2                                                                                                  \
00392         )                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       \
00393         {                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       \
00394                 return typename PromotionOf<T1,PointOf<3,T2> >::type(                                                   \
00395                         _fxn(t1, pt2.X())                                                                                                                                                                                       \
00396                         , _fxn(t1, pt2.Y())                                                                                                                                                                             \
00397                         , _fxn(t1, pt2.Z())                                                                                                                                                                             \
00398                 );                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      \
00399         }
